message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. How about we settle on $135?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $125? I'm willing to compromise, but I really need to get this product for under $130.
I see you're getting close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $130? It's the highest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still trying to squeeze out a bit more savings. How about we meet at $128? I'm willing to make a deal at that price.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $130, Bob. I think that's a fair price for the product. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
